verses.verse: Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%> and stricken <S%H935><s%> in years <S%H3117><s%>; and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H2204><s%>, You are old and stricken <S%H935><s%> in years <S%H3117><s%>, and there remains <S%H7604><s%> yet very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to be possessed <S%H3423><s%>.
This is the land <S%H776><s%> that yet remains <S%H7604><s%>: all the borders <S%H1552><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and all Geshuri <S%H1651><s%>,

From Sihor <S%H7883><s%>, which is before <S%H6440><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, even unto the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>, which is counted <S%H2803><s%> to the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>: five <S%H2568><s%> lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>; the Gazathites <S%H5841><s%>, and the Ashdothites <S%H796><s%>, the Eshkalonites <S%H832><s%>, the Gittites <S%H1663><s%>, and the Ekronites <S%H6139><s%>; also the Avites <S%H5761><s%>:

From the south <S%H8486><s%>, all the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, and Mearah <S%H4632><s%> that is beside the Sidonians <S%H6722><s%>, unto Aphek <S%H663><s%>, to the borders <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>:

And the land <S%H776><s%> of the Giblites <S%H1382><s%>, and all Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%>, from Baal <S%H1171><s%>–gad under mountain <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%> unto the entering <S%H935><s%> into Hamath <S%H2574><s%>.

All the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the hill country <S%H2022><s%> from Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> unto Misrephoth <S%H4956><s%>–maim, and all the Sidonians <S%H6722><s%>, them will I drive out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: only divide you it by lot <S%H5307><s%> unto the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as I have commanded you <S%H6680><s%>.

Now therefore divide <S%H2505><s%> this land <S%H776><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%>, and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>,

With whom the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H5676><s%>, beyond Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>, even as Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave them <S%H5414><s%>;

From Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, that is upon the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon <S%H769><s%>, and the city <S%H5892><s%> that is in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%>, and all the plain <S%H4334><s%> of Medeba <S%H4311><s%> unto Dibon <S%H1769><s%>;

And all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, which reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>;

And Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> and Maachathites <S%H4602><s%>, and all mountain <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%>, and all Bashan <S%H1316><s%> unto Salcah <S%H5548><s%>;

All the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, which reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> and in Edrei <S%H154><s%>, who remained <S%H7604><s%> of the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of the giants <S%H7497><s%>: for these did Moses <S%H4872><s%> strike <S%H5221><s%>, and cast them out <S%H3423><s%>.

Nevertheless the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> expelled <S%H3423><s%> not the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%>, nor the Maachathites <S%H4602><s%>: but the Geshurites <S%H1650><s%> and the Maachathites <S%H4601><s%> live <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> until this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Only unto the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%>; the sacrifices <S%H801><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%> are their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as he said unto them <S%H1696><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> inheritance according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

And their coast <S%H1366><s%> was from Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, that is on the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon <S%H769><s%>, and the city <S%H5892><s%> that is in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%>, and all the plain <S%H4334><s%> by Medeba <S%H4311><s%>;
Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and all her cities <S%H5892><s%> that are in the plain <S%H4334><s%>; Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, and Bamoth <S%H1120><s%>–baal, and Beth <S%H1010><s%>–baal–meon,
And Jahazah <S%H3096><s%>, and Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%>, and Mephaath <S%H4158><s%>,
And Kirjathaim <S%H7156><s%>, and Sibmah <S%H7643><s%>, and Zareth <S%H6890><s%>–shahar in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%>,
And Beth <S%H1047><s%>–peor, and Ashdoth <S%H798><s%>–pisgah, and Beth <S%H1020><s%>–jeshimoth,

And all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain <S%H4334><s%>, and all the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, which reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> with the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>, Evi <S%H189><s%>, and Rekem <S%H7552><s%>, and Zur <S%H6698><s%>, and Hur <S%H2354><s%>, and Reba <S%H7254><s%>, which were chiefs <S%H5257><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%>, living <S%H3427><s%> in the country <S%H776><s%>.

Balaam <S%H1109><s%> also the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%>, the soothsayer <S%H7080><s%>, did the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> kill <S%H2026><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%> among them <S%H413><s%> that were slain by them <S%H2491><s%>.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> was Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and the border <S%H1366><s%> there <S%H5159><s%>. This was the inheritance of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>, the cities <S%H5892><s%> and the villages there <S%H2691><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> inheritance unto the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, even unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

And their coast <S%H1366><s%> was Jazer <S%H3270><s%>, and all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, unto Aroer <S%H6177><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> Rabbah <S%H7237><s%>;
And from Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> unto Ramath <S%H7434><s%>–mizpeh, and Betonim <S%H993><s%>; and from Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%> unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%>;

And in the valley <S%H6010><s%>, Beth <S%H1027><s%>–aram, and Beth <S%H1039><s%>–nimrah, and Succoth <S%H5523><s%>, and Zaphon <S%H6829><s%>, the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, Jordan <S%H3383><s%> and his border <S%H1366><s%>, even unto the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>.
This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>, the cities <S%H5892><s%>, and their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> inheritance unto the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>: and this was the possession of the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>.

And their coast <S%H1366><s%> was from Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%>, all Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, all the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, and all the towns <S%H2333><s%> of Jair <S%H2971><s%>, which are in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, sixty <S%H8346><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>:

And half <S%H2677><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%>, and Edrei <S%H154><s%>, cities <S%H5892><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, were pertaining unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, even to the one half <S%H2677><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>.

These are the countries which Moses <S%H4872><s%> did distribute for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, by Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, eastward <S%H4217><s%>.

But unto the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> not any inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as he said unto them <S%H1696><s%>.
